TopicTitle: Help! My game was working fine, then... Something happened.

Articles.Content:
I was trying to build a simple space-plane (maybe a dozen parts), and I attached the B9 procedural wings. After fiddling with them to get the shape right, I right-clicked the wings to set the fuel type- and nothing. I couldn't right-click anything else. Then I restarted the game, and tried to do the same thing, only I checked to see if the cockpit had the modulemanager patch applied (it adds the ModuleSAS to every command part), and I didn't see the slider for the asas.

Any idea why this might happen?

Log link:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/mnpzxqkpr9zoq1k/KSP.log?dl=0

Any fixes? It was working fine... Then everything went wonky.

Hmm...do you have duplicate module manager dll? Currently having a massive headache atm, so I will pass the log, but that sounds like a possible cause of loading things fine but things get screwed up.

Hmm...do you have duplicate module manager dll? Currently having a massive headache atm, so I will pass the log, but that sounds like a possible cause of loading things fine but things get screwed up.

Checked for that. I do not have duplicate mod-manager dll's.

This is just spamming the lower half of the log
